story:
Short Summary - En bref - In breve

ENG: It was 2012 when part of our team reached Morocco for the first time. We were looking for ancient mines but wat we found was Aouam, its fortress and its huge mine, exploited from pre-historic times till now. We found a forgotten place that needs to be re discovered and promoted, but no-one can do this without involving local dweller.

In 2014, we came back to Aouam and started working. We made a preliminary digging and we worked closely with local institutions and associations, that asked us to create a museum to help promoting their land: they want this museum to tell the long story of Aouam and Tighza from pre-historic exploitation to modern times. But there is a second aim to create this archaeo-mining museum: the population of Aouam and Tighza, always connected to the mine since the beginning of their history, are now suffering major occupational crisis connected to economic and social problems. This is why the new museum will be not only a new way to link people to their homeland and history, but also the engine for a true re-birth.

Thanks to education courses and didactic laboratories, unemployed, young people and kids will learn everything they need to manage and take care of the museum, starting from French and everyday conservation of the objects, in order to work together to promote the site to the major public, inside and outside Morocco. This is why the project will be strongly linked to local school, one of the first school of the area to accept both boys and girls. They will have the opportunity to learn, play and grow in and with the museum.

Then the most important part of our project will follow. We plan professional training for local students, in order to involve them into management and promotion of their heritage and let them act for the economic growth of their homeland.

Together with this, we are planning cultural exchange with Italian schools, to complete professional training of Moroccan students with an intensive month in Rome. When this period will end, guys will be back in Morocco with brand new competences and experiences to use at home. They will learn French, Italian and English even in distance learning: other subjects will be history, tourist managment, microeconomy and business management.


FR: C’est en 2012 qu’une partie de notre équipe s’est rendue au Maroc pour la première fois. À la recherche de mines antiques, nous avons découvert Aouam, avec sa forteresse et son immense mine, exploitée sans interruptions depuis la préhistoire. Nous avons trouvé un monde oublié particulièrement riche et prometteur méritant d’être redécouvert et valorisé, ce qui ne pouvait se faire qu’en collaboration avec la population locale.

Nous sommes revenus à Aouam en 2014 et nous avons commencé à travailler. Nous avons effectué des fouilles préliminaires en opérant en étroite relation avec les institutions et les associations locales, qui nous ont demandé de créer un musée pour les aider à promouvoir leur territoire. Ce qu’ils veulent, c’est un musée qui raconte la longue histoire d’Aouam et Tighza depuis la préhistoire jusqu’à nos jours. Mais il y a une autre raison à la réalisation d’un parc archéo-minier : la population d’Aouam et Tighza, qui a toujours vécu en étroite relation avec la mine depuis ses origines jusqu’à présent, est actuellement frappée par une crise importante due à la difficile situation économique et sociale de la région. C’est pourquoi la création du parc et du musée permettrait aux habitants de ces lieux non seulement de disposer d’un lieu accueillant l’histoire et la mémoire de leur terre mais constituerait également l’instrument d’une véritable renaissance et d’un futur possible pour les jeunes du pays

À l’intérieur du musée, les enfants pourront suivre des cours et participer à des ateliers thématiques. En effet, le projet fortement lié aux établissements scolaires locaux, et c’est l’une des premières structure de la zone à accueillir à la fois filles et garçons. Ceux-ci auront ainsi l’opportunité d’apprendre à lire, étudier, jouer et grandir en contact avec leur musée, non interprété uniquement comme espace destiné à héberger le passé, mais également comme lieu de vie pour construire leur futur.

Le projet comporte aussi un programme de formation professionnelle de personnel qualifié choisi localement, dans l’objectif de l’insertion professionnelle des habitants de la zone, afin qu’ils puissent acquérir les connaissances et les compétences indispensables pour gérer et entretenir leur propre patrimoine culturel et environnemental, et qu’ils soient les protagonistes du développement économique et social de leur terre. Nous commencerons par l’enseignement et le perfectionnement de la langue française et de la langue italienne, puis nous continuerons par la conservation des biens culturels et naturels, et enfin, nous travaillerons ensembles à la promotion du site au Maroc et à l’étranger.

Cette importante phase du projet prévoit également des échanges culturels avec des écoles italiennes d’orientation touristique pour pouvoir conclure la formation des jeunes Marocains par un séjour d’étude en Italie, au terme duquel ils retourneront dans leur pays avec un bagage complet de connaissances applicables à la réalité locale. Les jeunes apprenants recevront une formation linguistique en français, italien et anglais, entre autre à travers une plateforme de formation à distance ; les matières plus spécifiquement professionnelles comprendront non seulement l’histoire et la gestion touristique, mais également la micro-économie et la gestion d’entreprise.


IT: È nel 2012 che una parte della nostra squadra è approdata in Marocco per la prima volta. Eravamo alla ricerca di miniere antiche e abbiamo scoperto Aouam, la sua fortezza et la sua immense miniera, operativa sin dalla preistoria e tuttora attiva. Abbiamo trovato un sito dimenticato che merita di essere riscoperto e promosso, con  il coinvolgimento però della popolazione locale.

Nel 2014, siamo tornati ad Aouam e abbiamo cominciato a lavorare. Abbiamo effettuato uno scavo preliminare e operato in stretta collaborazione con le istituzioni ed associazioni locali, che ci hanno chiesto di aiutarli a promuovere la loro terra: vogliono che un nuovo museo racconti la lunga storia di  Aouam et Tighza dallo sfruttamento preistorico iniziale fino ai giorni nostri. Vi è però un secondo scopo nel realizzare questo museo archeominerario: la popolazione di Aouam et Tighza,  la cui sorte è sempre stata legatissima alla miniera sin dalla sua creazione, subisce attualmente una fortissimo crisi occupazionale legata alla congiuntura economica. Per questo motivo, la costruzione del museo non solo permetterà alla popolazione locale di conservare la memoria della propria terra, ma sarà lo strumento di una vera e propria rinascita, permettendo alle giovani generazioni di crearsi un futuro.

La nostra equipe preparerà lo svolgimento di corrsi e laboratori tematici per i bambini e i ragazzi. Si tratta quindi di un progetto fortemente legato alle scuole della zona, uno dei primi a rivolgersi sia alle femmine che ai maschi. Potranno imparare a leggere, studiare, giocare e crescere in stretto contatto con il loro museo, che sarà visto non come un ripostiglio chiuso dove conservare l’eredità del passato, ma come luogo da vivere per costruire il proprio futuro.

Ma soprattutto, oltre ai contenuti per le scuole, il progetto comporta anche un programma di formazione professionale di personale qualificato scelto in zona con l’obiettivo di inserire gli abitanti in un contesto professionale, fornendo loro gli strumenti per acquisire le conoscenze e le competenze indispensabili alla gestione al mantenimento del patrimonio culturale e ambientale locale e per essere gli artefici dello sviluppo economico e sociale della propria terra.  Cominceremo con l’insegnamento e il perfezionamento della lingua francese e della lingua italiana, continueremo con le materie legate alla conservazione dei beni culturali ed ambientali, e infine lavoreremo insieme alla promozione del sito in Marocco e all’estero.

In questo orizzonte sono in fase di progettazioni eventuali scambi culturali con scuole italiane di turismo, per poter concludere la formazione dei ragazzi marocchini con un periodo di studio in Italia, al termine del quale i ragazzi torneranno nel loro paese con un  nuovo bagaglio completo di conoscenze applicabili alla loro realtà locale. Ai ragazzi verrà insegnato, oltre al francese, l’italiano e l’inglese utilizzando anche piattaforme di formazione a distanza; le materie professionalizzanti non si limiteranno a quelle attinenti la storia e la gestione turistica, ma comprenderanno anche microeconomia e gestione d’impresa.

What We Need & What We Get - Ce qu’il nous faut & et ce que nous en faisons - Che cosa ci serve e che cosa ne facciamo

ENG: The AIM, together with CNR, will organize couses and laboratories in Aouam. Mining company of Tighza (CMT), with the Association Abghour Puor le Developpement, the Association Tighza Atlas and local schools will give us some rooms for our classes.

What we need is furniture and tools. Our aim is to gain 3000€ to buy teaching aids, computers, a printer, paper, crayons, books to create a little library of economy, history and archaeology, and everything we may need during our training courses and in laboratories, such as internet connection. All the money gained, whether we manage to reach the entire goal or not, will be used to buy learning supplies.

FR: L’ AIM, en collaboration avec le CNR, réalisera l’Ecomusée d’Aouam-Tighza pour y accueillir l’importante histoire locale et offrir un futur aux jeunes résidents. La compagnie minière de  Tighza (CMT), en association avec l'Association Abghour Puor le Developpement et l'Association Tighza Atlas nous réservera un bâtiment pour y organiser le musée, où héberger le patrimoine archéologique. Il comprendra également une salle de conférence pour y organiser des cours et des ateliers ; des cours seront également organisés dans les écoles locales.

Nous avons besoin de meubles et de matériel. Notre but est de rassembler 3000 euros pour pouvoir acheter du matériel didactique, des ordinateurs, une imprimante, du papier, des stylos, des livres, afin de créer une petite bibliothèque contenant des manuels d’histoire, d’archéologie et d’économie, et tout ce qui nous sert pour les cours de formation et  les activités dans les ateliers, y compris une connexion Internet. Tout l’argent recueilli, que nous atteignons ou non le montant fixé, servira à acheter du matériel didactique.

IT: L‘AIM, insieme al CNR, si occuperà dei corsi in Marocco. La società mineraria di Tighza (CMT), insieme alle associazioni Abghour Puor le Developpement e Tighza Atlas e alle scuole locali, forniranno i locali per lo svolgimento di lezioni e laboratori.

Quello che ci serve è mobilio et strumenti. Il nostro scopo è di raggiungere 3000 euro per comprare materiale didattico, computer, una stampante, carta, penne, libri per creare una piccolo biblioteca di economia, storia ed archeologia, e tutto ciò che possa servire per i corsi di formazione e i laboratori, come una connessione Internet. Tutto il denaro ricevuto, se raggiungeremo o no la soglia fissata, sarà speso per comprare materiale didattico.

The Impact - Impact - Conseguenze

ENG: Everything will be bought by local factories, everything will be addressed to local people, in order to really help social development and economy of this part of Morocco.

Our team made something similar in past years in Algeria. AIM and CNR worked together in the most important Algerian cultural institutions, to train curators, tourist guides and restorers, who started working inside the museums. You can check what we did here:  http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it 

But this time we need everything, we need people all over the world join together and help kids from Aouam and Tighza to have their own museum, help young people to have a different future, to help a whole community to get out the crisis, to help Morocco to have its first archaeo-mining museum.

Our final aim is to give to local people all the possible instruments to manage their heritage in a clever way. They will be able to gain together in microenterprises, in order not to leave their homeland for job seeking, but to be the real authors of its economic rebirth. 

FR: Tout ce que nous devons acheter sera acquis auprès de fournisseurs locaux et servira aux habitants de la zone, afin de fournir une véritable aide  au développement social et économique de cette partie du Maroc.

·  Notre équipe a déjà l’expérience d’une action de ce type en Algérie. AIM et CNR  ont travaillé ensemble avec les institutions culturelles algériennes les plus importantes afin de former et  mettre à jour des conservateurs, des guides touristiques et des restaurateurs, qui ont commencé à travailler dans les musées. Vous pouvez vous rendre compte de notre travail ici:  http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it 

 Cette fois cependant, nous avons besoin de toute votre participation, nous avons besoin que des gens de tous horizons collaborent à notre projet  et aident les jeunes d’ Aouam et de Tighza à réaliser leur musée et construire eux-mêmes un future meilleur sur leur terre, aidant ainsi toute la communauté à sortir d’une conjoncture particulièrement difficile,  et le Maroc à obtenir son première musée archéo-minier.

L'objectif final est donc de parvenir à donner aux jeunes de la localité les instruments nécessaires pour gérer au mieux le patrimoine matériel et immatériel de leur territoire en créant des micro-entreprises, afin qu'ils ne soient pas contraints d'émigrer loin de leur terre, mais qu'ils soient au contraire les protagonistes de leur renaissance économique.

IT: Tutto ciò che compreremo sarà di produzione locale e destinato alla popolazione locale, al fin di creare un vero sviluppo sociale e economico in questa zona del Marocco.

La nostra squadra a svolto un’azione simili qualche anno fa in Algeria. AIM e CNR hanno lavorato insieme con le maggiori istituzioni culturali del paese per formare curatori, guide turistiche e restauratori, che hanno poi cominciato a lavorare nei musei. Potete vedere il nostro operato sul sito http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it  

Questo volta però, abbiamo bisogno di tutto, abbiamo bisogno che gente di tutti i paesi collabori con noi e aiuti i ragazzi di  Aouam et Tighza a realizzare il loro museo, i giovani a crearsi un future,  un’intera comunità ad uscire da una situazione molto difficile e il Marocco ad avere il suo primo archeomuseo minerario. 

L’obiettivo finale è quindi quello di riuscire a dare ai giovani del luogo gli strumenti per gestire in modo serio il loro patrimonio materiale e immateriale, per poter associarsi e creare microimpresa, affinché non siano costretti ad emigrare dalla loro terra, ma anzi diventino i primi autori della sua rinascita economica.


Risks & Challenges - Risques & Défis - Rischi e Sfide

ENG:  Our biggest problem is obviously the constant lack of money: if we don’t manage to gain money on our own, it is not possible to create this whole network of knowledge. We have to be the starting sparkle of this project, if we won't want this to be just a nice dream.

We applied to various calls for funding in Italy, Morocco, Europe, but the concurrence is big and our little community may not be strong enough to win. This is why we ask the whole world to help us!

FR: Notre problème principal est bien évidemment le manque d’argent constant : si nous ne parvenons pas à réunir la somme nécessaire de nous-mêmes, nous ne pourrons pas réaliser ce projet. Nous devons pouvoir faire jaillir la première étincelle qui permettra de lancer le projet, si nous ne voulons pas qu’il ne reste qu’un beau rêve impossible.

Nous avons envoyé plusieurs demandes de fonds en Italie, Maroc, Europe, mais la concurrence est telle que notre petite communauté pourrait ne pas être assez forte pour gagner la partie. C’est la raison pour laquelle nous faisons appel au monde entier pour nous aider !

IT: Il nostro problema più importante è ovviamente la costante mancanza di denaro: se non riusciamo ad ottenere i fondi necessari, non possiamo realizzare il progetto. Dobbiamo essere la scintilla che permette al progetto di partire, se non vogliamo che rimanga un bel sogno irrealizzabile. 

Abbiamo risposto a diversi bandi per ottener fondi in Italia, Marocco, Europa, ma ci è molta concorrenza et la nostra piccolo comunità potrebbe non essere abbastanza forte per vincere. Per questa ragione, chiediamo al mondo intero di aiutarci!

Other Ways You Can Help - D'autres moyen de nous aider - Altri Modi di Aiutarci

ENG: If it is no possible to you to give us concrete help, please share, get the word out, let the world know what we are doing here and what we need! 

FR: S’il ne vous est pas possible de nous appoter une aide concrète, nous vous prions de diffuser notre appel, afin que tout le monde sache ce que nous voulons faire et de quoi nous avons besoin! 

IT: Se non vi è possibile offrirci un aiuto concreto, allora vi preghiamo di diffondere il nostro appello, affinché il mondo sappia cosa facciamo e cosa ci serve!

recherche de mines antiques, nous avons découvert Aouam, avec sa forteresse et
son immense mine, exploitée sans interruptions depuis la préhistoire. Nous
avons trouvé un monde oublié particulièrement riche et prometteur méritant
d’être redécouvert et valorisé, ce qui ne pouvait se faire qu’en collaboration
avec la population locale.

Nous sommes
revenus à Aouam en 2014 et nous avons commencé à travailler. Nous avons
effectué des fouilles préliminaires en opérant en étroite relation avec les
institutions et les associations locales, qui nous ont demandé de créer un
musée pour les aider à promouvoir leur territoire. Ce qu’ils veulent, c’est un
musée qui raconte la longue histoire d’Aouam et Tighza depuis la préhistoire
jusqu’à nos jours. Mais il y a une autre raison à la réalisation d’un parc
archéo-minier : la population d’Aouam et Tighza, qui a toujours vécu en étroite
relation avec la mine depuis ses origines jusqu’à présent, est actuellement
frappée par une crise importante due à la difficile situation économique et
sociale de la région. C’est pourquoi la création du parc et du musée permettrait
aux habitants de ces lieux non seulement de disposer d’un lieu accueillant
l’histoire et la mémoire de leur terre mais constituerait également l’instrument
d’une véritable renaissance et d’un futur possible pour les jeunes du pays
À l’intérieur
du musée, les enfants pourront suivre des cours et participer à des ateliers thématiques.
En effet, le projet fortement lié aux établissements scolaires locaux, et c’est
l’une des premières structure de la zone à accueillir à la fois filles et garçons.
Ceux-ci auront ainsi l’opportunité d’apprendre à lire, étudier, jouer et
grandir en contact avec leur musée, non interprété uniquement comme espace
destiné à héberger le passé, mais également comme lieu de vie pour construire
leur futur.
Le projet
comporte aussi un programme de formation professionnelle de personnel qualifié
choisi localement, dans l’objectif de l’insertion professionnelle des habitants
de la zone, afin qu’ils puissent acquérir les connaissances et les compétences
indispensables pour gérer et entretenir leur propre patrimoine culturel et
environnemental, et qu’ils soient les protagonistes du développement économique
et social de leur terre. Nous commencerons par l’enseignement et le
perfectionnement de la langue française et de la langue italienne, puis nous continuerons
par la conservation des biens culturels et naturels, et enfin, nous
travaillerons ensembles à la promotion du site au Maroc et à l’étranger. 
Cette
importante phase du projet prévoit également des échanges culturels avec des
écoles italiennes d’orientation touristique pour pouvoir conclure la formation
des jeunes Marocains par un séjour d’étude en Italie, au terme duquel ils
retourneront dans leur pays avec un bagage complet de connaissances applicables
à la réalité locale. Les jeunes apprenants recevront une formation linguistique
en français, italien et anglais, entre autre à travers une plateforme de
formation à distance ; les matières plus spécifiquement professionnelles
comprendront non seulement l’histoire et la gestion touristique, mais également
la micro-économie et la gestion d’entreprise.


IT: È nel 2012 che una parte della nostra
squadra è approdata in Marocco per la prima volta. Eravamo alla ricerca di
miniere antiche e abbiamo scoperto Aouam, la sua fortezza et la sua immense
miniera, operativa sin dalla preistoria e tuttora attiva. Abbiamo trovato un
sito dimenticato che merita di essere riscoperto e promosso, con  il coinvolgimento però della popolazione
locale.

Nel 2014, siamo tornati ad Aouam e abbiamo
cominciato a lavorare. Abbiamo effettuato uno scavo preliminare e operato in
stretta collaborazione con le istituzioni ed associazioni locali, che ci hanno
chiesto di aiutarli a promuovere la loro terra: vogliono che un nuovo museo racconti
la lunga storia di  Aouam et Tighza dallo
sfruttamento preistorico iniziale fino ai giorni nostri. Vi è però un secondo
scopo nel realizzare questo museo archeominerario: la popolazione di Aouam et
Tighza,  la cui sorte è sempre stata
legatissima alla miniera sin dalla sua creazione, subisce attualmente una
fortissimo crisi occupazionale legata alla congiuntura economica. Per questo
motivo, la costruzione del museo non solo permetterà alla popolazione locale di
conservare la memoria della propria terra, ma sarà lo strumento di una vera e
propria rinascita, permettendo alle giovani generazioni di crearsi un futuro. 
La nostra equipe preparerà lo svolgimento di
corrsi e laboratori tematici per i bambini e i ragazzi. Si tratta quindi di un
progetto fortemente legato alle scuole della zona, uno dei primi a rivolgersi
sia alle femmine che ai maschi. Potranno imparare a leggere, studiare, giocare
e crescere in stretto contatto con il loro museo, che sarà visto non come un
ripostiglio chiuso dove conservare l’eredità del passato, ma come luogo da
vivere per costruire il proprio futuro.
Ma soprattutto, oltre ai contenuti per le
scuole, il progetto comporta anche un programma di formazione professionale di personale
qualificato scelto in zona con l’obiettivo di inserire gli abitanti in un
contesto professionale, fornendo loro gli strumenti per acquisire le conoscenze
e le competenze indispensabili alla gestione al mantenimento del patrimonio
culturale e ambientale locale e per essere gli artefici dello sviluppo
economico e sociale della propria terra. 
Cominceremo con l’insegnamento e il perfezionamento della lingua francese
e della lingua italiana, continueremo con le materie legate alla conservazione
dei beni culturali ed ambientali, e infine lavoreremo insieme alla promozione
del sito in Marocco e all’estero.
In questo orizzonte sono in fase di
progettazioni eventuali scambi culturali con scuole italiane di turismo, per
poter concludere la formazione dei ragazzi marocchini con un periodo di studio
in Italia, al termine del quale i ragazzi torneranno nel loro paese con un  nuovo bagaglio completo di conoscenze
applicabili alla loro realtà locale. Ai ragazzi verrà insegnato, oltre al
francese, l’italiano e l’inglese utilizzando anche piattaforme di formazione a
distanza; le materie professionalizzanti non si limiteranno a quelle attinenti
la storia e la gestione turistica, ma comprenderanno anche microeconomia e
gestione d’impresa.

   What We Need & What We Get - Ce qu’il nous faut & et ce que nous en faisons - Che cosa ci serve e che cosa
ne facciamo
 ENG: The AIM, together with
CNR, will organize couses and laboratories in Aouam. Mining company of Tighza
(CMT), with the Association Abghour
Puor le Developpement, the Association Tighza Atlas and local schools will give us some rooms for our classes.

What we need is furniture and tools. Our aim is
to gain 3000€ to buy teaching aids, computers, a printer, paper, crayons, books
to create a little library of economy, history and archaeology, and everything
we may need during our training courses and in laboratories, such as internet
connection. All the money gained, whether we manage to reach the entire goal or
not, will be used to buy learning supplies.

FR: L’ AIM, en
collaboration avec le CNR, réalisera l’Ecomusée d’Aouam-Tighza pour y
accueillir l’importante histoire locale et offrir un futur aux jeunes résidents.
La compagnie minière de  Tighza (CMT), en
association avec l'Association Abghour Puor le Developpement et l'Association Tighza Atlas nous réservera un bâtiment pour y organiser le musée, où
héberger le patrimoine archéologique. Il comprendra également une salle de conférence
pour y organiser des cours et des ateliers ; des cours seront également organisés
dans les écoles locales.

Nous avons besoin de meubles et de matériel. Notre but est de rassembler 3000 euros pour pouvoir acheter du matériel didactique, des ordinateurs, une
imprimante, du papier, des stylos, des livres, afin de créer une petite
bibliothèque contenant des manuels d’histoire, d’archéologie et d’économie, et
tout ce qui nous sert pour les cours de formation et  les activités dans les ateliers, y compris
une connexion Internet. Tout l’argent recueilli, que nous atteignons ou non le
montant fixé, servira à acheter du matériel didactique.

IT: L‘AIM, insieme al CNR, si occuperà dei corsi
in Marocco. La società mineraria di Tighza (CMT), insieme alle associazioni Abghour Puor le Developpement e Tighza
Atlas e alle scuole locali, forniranno i locali per lo svolgimento di lezioni
e laboratori.

Quello che ci
serve è mobilio et strumenti. Il nostro scopo è di raggiungere 3000 euro per comprare
materiale didattico, computer, una stampante, carta, penne, libri per creare
una piccolo biblioteca di economia, storia ed archeologia, e tutto ciò che possa
servire per i corsi di formazione e i laboratori, come una connessione
Internet. Tutto il denaro ricevuto, se raggiungeremo o no la soglia fissata,
sarà speso per comprare materiale didattico.

    The Impact - Impact - Conseguenze 
ENG: Everything will be bought by local factories,
everything will be addressed to local people, in order to really help social
development and economy of this part of Morocco.

Our team
made something similar in past years in Algeria. AIM and CNR worked together in
the most important Algerian cultural institutions, to train curators, tourist
guides and restorers, who started working inside the museums. You can check
what we did here:  http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it  
But this
time we need everything, we need people all over the world join together and
help kids from Aouam and Tighza to have their own museum, help young people to have
a different future, to help a whole community to get out the crisis, to help
Morocco to have its first archaeo-mining museum.
Our final aim is to
give to local people all the possible instruments to manage their heritage in a
clever way. They will be able to gain together in microenterprises, in order
not to leave their homeland for job seeking, but to be the real authors of its
economic rebirth. 

FR: Tout ce que nous devons acheter sera acquis auprès de fournisseurs locaux
et servira aux habitants de la zone, afin de fournir une véritable aide  au développement social et économique de
cette partie du Maroc.

·  Notre équipe a déjà l’expérience d’une
action de ce type en Algérie. AIM et CNR  ont travaillé ensemble avec les institutions
culturelles algériennes les plus importantes afin de former et  mettre à jour des conservateurs, des guides
touristiques et des restaurateurs, qui ont commencé à travailler dans les
musées. Vous pouvez vous rendre
compte de notre travail ici:  http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it 
 Cette fois cependant, nous avons besoin de
toute votre participation, nous avons besoin que des gens de tous horizons
collaborent à notre projet  et aident les
jeunes d’ Aouam et de Tighza à réaliser leur musée et construire eux-mêmes un
future meilleur sur leur terre, aidant ainsi toute la communauté à sortir d’une
conjoncture particulièrement difficile,  et le Maroc à obtenir son première musée
archéo-minier.
L'objectif final est donc de parvenir à donner aux jeunes de la localité les instruments nécessaires pour gérer au mieux le patrimoine matériel et immatériel de leur territoire en créant des micro-entreprises, afin qu'ils ne soient pas contraints d'émigrer loin de leur terre, mais qu'ils soient au contraire les protagonistes de leur renaissance économique.

IT: Tutto ciò che
compreremo sarà di produzione locale e destinato alla popolazione locale, al
fin di creare un vero sviluppo sociale e economico in questa zona del Marocco.

La nostra squadra a svolto un’azione simili
qualche anno fa in Algeria. AIM e CNR hanno lavorato insieme con le maggiori
istituzioni culturali del paese per formare curatori, guide turistiche e restauratori,
che hanno poi cominciato a lavorare nei musei. Potete vedere il nostro operato
sul sito http://cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=81&Itemid=55&lang=it
 
Questo volta però, abbiamo bisogno di tutto,
abbiamo bisogno che gente di tutti i paesi collabori con noi e aiuti i ragazzi
di  Aouam et Tighza a realizzare il loro
museo, i giovani a crearsi un future,  un’intera
comunità ad uscire da una situazione molto difficile e il Marocco ad avere il
suo primo archeomuseo minerario.  
L’obiettivo finale è quindi quello di
riuscire a dare ai giovani del luogo gli strumenti per gestire in modo serio il
loro patrimonio materiale e immateriale, per poter associarsi e creare
microimpresa, affinché non siano costretti ad emigrare dalla loro terra, ma
anzi diventino i primi autori della sua rinascita economica.

   Risks & Challenges - Risques & Défis - Rischi e Sfide
  
ENG:  Our biggest problem is obviously the
constant lack of money: if we don’t manage to gain money on our own, it is not
possible to create this whole network of knowledge. We have to be the starting
sparkle of this project, if we won't want this to be just a nice dream.


We applied to various calls for
funding in Italy, Morocco, Europe, but the concurrence is big and our little
community may not be strong enough to win. This is why we ask the whole world
to help us!
FR: Notre problème principal est bien évidemment le
manque d’argent constant : si nous ne parvenons pas à réunir la somme
nécessaire de nous-mêmes, nous ne pourrons pas réaliser ce projet. Nous devons pouvoir
faire jaillir la première étincelle qui permettra de lancer le projet, si nous
ne voulons pas qu’il ne reste qu’un beau rêve impossible.
Nous avons envoyé plusieurs demandes de fonds en
Italie, Maroc, Europe, mais la concurrence est telle que notre petite
communauté pourrait ne pas être assez forte pour gagner la partie. C’est la
raison pour laquelle nous faisons appel au monde entier pour nous aider !
IT: Il
nostro problema più importante è ovviamente la costante mancanza di denaro: se
non riusciamo ad ottenere i fondi necessari, non possiamo realizzare il
progetto. Dobbiamo essere la scintilla che permette al progetto di partire, se
non vogliamo che rimanga un bel sogno irrealizzabile. 
Abbiamo
risposto a diversi bandi per ottener fondi in Italia, Marocco, Europa, ma ci è
molta concorrenza et la nostra piccolo comunità potrebbe non essere abbastanza
forte per vincere. Per questa ragione, chiediamo al mondo intero di aiutarci!

Other Ways You Can Help - D'autres moyen de nous aider - Altri Modi di Aiutarci
 
ENG: If it is no possible to you to give
us concrete help, please share, get the word out, let the world know what we
are doing here and what we need! FR: S’il ne vous est pas possible de nous appoter une
aide concrète, nous vous prions de diffuser notre appel, afin que tout le monde
sache ce que nous voulons faire et de quoi nous avons besoin! 
IT: Se non vi è possibile offrirci un aiuto concreto, allora vi preghiamo
di diffondere il nostro appello, affinché il mondo sappia cosa facciamo e cosa
ci serve!

story:
THE "WHY": STATE OF THE SheEO®

“Women need to shift from thinking ‘I’m not ready to do that’ to thinking ‘I want to do that – and I’ll learn by doing it.” ~Sheryl Sandberg
(COO, Facebook; Author, Lean In)

Despite many initiatives and improvements, there is still a disparity in the profile of women-owned businesses and females at the C-suite level.

And the trend in program development for girls’ enrichment is around STEM and STEAM. Often these programs are missing a key programmatic complement around the ownership and community use (and integration) of technology and innovation.

 

FOR "WHO": INSPIRE HER TO BE A SheEO®

“Don’t worry about being successful, but work towards being significant and the success will naturally follow.” ~Oprah Winfrey

Articles, studies and successful CEOs all say we need to encourage more girls to...
*problem solve & innovate
*understand business & financial literacy
*develop and pursue their vision
*explore and discuss leadership & entrepreneurship

She-EO, LLC provides FIVE opportunities for girls to do ALL OF THAT while introducing them to other like-minded girls to 1) mastermind, 2) set goals, and 3) have fun. 

Camp SheEO® <> SheEO® Academy <> Club SheEO® <> SheEO® Coaching  SheEO® Birthday Parties

 

HOW & NOW: EMPOWERING SheEO®s EVERYWHERE

"BE the change you want to see in the world." ~Ghandi

Entrepreneurs use their talents and passion 1) to create useful things 2) that make a difference and 3) contribute to a thriving community. Every girl that takes ownership in a worthy cause, product or business changes the future for herself and for her family. We started in Virginia, and now we want to expose, enrich, and empower girls everywhere to aspire to BE A SheEO one day - maybe tomorrow! 

Please view our PHOTO GALLERY to see more SheEO GIRLS IN ACTION: PRESENTING, SETTING GOALS, MEETING REAL SheEO MENTORS, and HAVING FUN!


USE OF FUNDING

story:
ART SALVAGE

Art Salvage is a unique art and education program from San Francisco natives, and current Salt Lake City residents Clam Lynch (Production Designer, Artist and Children's Book Author) and Margo Graham (Co-Founder of San Francisco Rock Project for Children)

    Art Salvage collects, organizes and distributes discarded materials for artist, students, educators and creative people of all ages. Art Salvage will also be open on weekends for projects designed to teach  kids the importance of sustainability thru the arts.

    We need a space, to open our concept. In most metropolitan cities there is a retail space for artist to purchase low cost supplies.

    TO BREAK IT DOWN:

    • We need funding for basic opening cost-rent, deposit, building out the shop.
    • We will bring art to at risk youth in our community. We currently host classes in our backyard on the weekends and the turn out is growing. The winter is approaching and we need a space for the kids to continue making art on the weekends.
    • If we do not meet our goal, we will continue with fundraising in our community. In addition Clam will set aside proceeds from sales of his Art sales to attain our goal.

    The Impact

    Our purpose is to promote sustainability through up-cycling materials that would otherwise be thrown out for the purpose of art, education and creativity.

    Art Salvage will also work with children and the public on building, producing art projects pieces. These programs will educate our community on how awesome reusing materials can be. It will also enhance the art culture awareness in Utah, and support transforming waste into art.

    Risks & Challenges

    The risks are like any new business. Art Salvage plans on selling up-cycled items handmade by Clam Lynch. Clam current has been selling reclaimed barn-wood tables, industrial pieces and one of a kind barn-wood arrows and signs all from reclaimed wood form Utah. The proceeds of these sales will sustain the operation. Utah has a plethora of waste that is easily attained form several source we have acquired.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We will need volunteers on the weekends to help with classes. Donate unwanted items. We will update our Facebook page with a list weekly of items we are in need of. Tell your friends about Art Salvage, ask them to donate, share our campaign.

story:
EQUIPPING AND TRAINING HEALERS WHO EXPERIENCE GOD'S HEALING MIRACLES AND LOVE 

     Hi, I’m Dr. Susan Richards, a medical doctor and an ordained minister. I received my M.D. from Northwestern University and served on the clinical faculty of Stanford University School of Medicine. 

      I've been doing medical ministry in the hospitals of the San Francisco area for more than five years and have seen God touch thousands of hopeless patients and miraculously heal them. 

     I see the crippled walk, the blind see and the deaf hear, all through God's love. Like millions of other people in our country, their doctors had given up on them and offered little hope. 

     Recently, God spoke to me and said that He wanted me to create the first medically based school of healing in the U.S. that would train many thousands of dedicated students to experience the same type of healing miracles. 


     Today we are close to launching this vision. The Medical School of Healing is ready to open it's doors!  We are ready to make a difference in your life as well as  your friends and loved ones!

     We have a world-class faculty of Christian medical doctors, ministers, creative artists and other gifted healers from many different fields who God has put together!

     We have created the Medical School of Healing to train our students both medically and spiritually to minister to the sick and wounded and experience God’s gift of miracle healing!

     Our goal is for our students to walk in the power and love of God and see God’s healing miracles on a consistent basis.

OUR VISION

     Our world is in need of God’s transforming love. Millions of people suffer from illness and injury. People also need healing in relationships, finances and in their physical, emotional and spiritual lives.


       God’s plan is to have everyone be healthy and strong and have the life of their dreams- full of joy, love and abundance. Our program will empower our students to heal the sick and wounded and to transform lives through God! 




WHERE WE ARE NOW

The Medical of School of Healing is God’s project and His creation. God has been greatly blessing our project  In a short period of time we now have:


  • Over 1 Million followers on Facebook and growing exponentially

  • 1,500,000 requests annually for healing prayer and an incredible, dedicated prayer team

  • World changing university that is ready to launch

                              

  • Innovative and exciting program with conferences and healing clinic starting right away as we move towards our school's launch!

  • Incredible teaching faculty of Christian medical doctors, prayer healers, inner healing counselors, top biblical scholars and exceptional healers

  • Plan for nationwide Healing and Community Centers  

  • Ready to launch and transform and uplift the lives of millions of people and their communities



THE IMPACT

     Be part of our future! Support the Medical School of Healing as we train students that transform their local and global communities with the love and healing power of God.

     Your contribution funds will help us secure the facilities, equipment, staff and faculty to launch and continue through the first phase of our program.

     Jesus wants us to create heaven on earth and to go out and heal the sick and love one another as He loves us. Our program will provide an incredible springboard to launch students into the supernatural miracle life that God created them to enjoy. 

OUR PROGRAM

Here are the seven components of our incredible program!

  1. Medical Training for Healers  - provides healers with the medical knowledge of God's design of the human body for the purpose of ministering  from a medical perspective

  2. Healing and Praying for the Sick and Wounded -  provides a broad range of supernaturally inspired teaching that empowers them for healing 

  3. Healing the Healers -  develops spiritually, mentally, and physically healthy students 

  4. Collaborative Prayer Program - brings all of our students together to pray and worship as one body in Christ 


  5. Practical Field Ministry - integrates what our students are learning in the classroom with hands-on experiential ministry. 

  6. Expert Healing Program - expert healers from a wide variety of backgrounds will share their lives, testimonies, tips and guidance with our students

  7. Community Enrichment Program - brings students together on a more personal basis and builds community among the MSH family.

                     OUR FOUNDER

                                           

             

    I love being both a medical doctor and minister! It’s a wonderful gift from God to be able to heal and serve others and see people restored to health, body, mind and soul.    

     In the five years since God first led me to begin ministering to the sick and injured in the hospitals in of the San Francisco area, I have seen many healing miracles of God with the sickest patients. I have also seen incredible transformation of people's lives.

TESTIMONIES

Here are a few of the incredible cases of God’s supernatural miracle healings that I have seen in my healing ministry.

Quadriplegic walks! I prayed for a man who was in a nearly fatal car collision and broke his neck. He was admitted to the hospital ICU on full life support as a quadriplegic, with no movement or feeling below the neck and shoulders. Normally, he would have to spend his life in a wheelchair.

With prayer, God healed him very rapidly. He was discharged from the hospital already walking again. He is now bowling and starting to run which is normally impossible for quadriplegics to do.

Critical Brain Injury Recovers. I prayed for a five year old girl who was in the pediatric ICU. She was in a car crash and had a very serious brain injury. Her doctors had to cut a hole in her skull and and insert a plastic drain tube to relieve intracranial pressure. She was in a coma for three weeks and had fractures of  her arm and jaw.

     As I prayed for her, God healed and blessed her. She began to talk and interact again and was up walking very quickly. She went home with no sign of brain injury a month before her expected date of leaving the hospital.

Shortened, withered arm lengthens and heals. I love this case of an 85 year old man who I prayed for who had a withered right arm that was paralyzed and much shorter than his left arm. His daughter said that his arm had always been that way and that he had never had the use of that arm.

     With prayer and the power of God, his right arm suddenly grew out to the size and length of the left arm and he regained movement in the paralyzed arm.

                                           

Unbearable pain is gone. I ministered to a man who was in constant pain and could hardly walk due to severe injury to his knees. The cartilage was so worn down that he had bone grinding on bone. Knee surgery had failed and he couldn't work at construction, his regular job. After healing prayer, the pain was totally gone and he can now walk easily and even work again.


Severe deafness healed. I prayed for a man who was in the hospital and suffered from severe hearing loss. He was deaf in both ears and could barely hear, even if you stood right next to him, literally shouting into his ears. With healing prayer, his hearing returned and he could hear perfectly, even at a distance!

Radical weight loss. I love seeing cases of God’s supernatural weight loss. I prayed for a man who weighed 700 pounds and was morbidly obese. He was in the hospital ICU on life support and had only a 30% chance of surviving. I prayed for him and he lost almost 250 pounds in less than 1 month.This is medically impossible and was a total miracle of God.




Received two new cars, God’s double portion. “I requested prayer from Dr. Susan for a vehicle because we were in desperate need of a car and today we were blessed with not only one but 2 new vehicles. Used but new to us and very low miles"

God opens doors for multiple jobs. God blessed a woman who I recently prayed for: “Opportunities are knocking after a year of unemployment!... I am the most anointed administrator, manager and executive in Jesus Name, amen!"

God brings financial prosperity to a snack stand. I was at a mall shopping when I saw a snack stand that was selling pretzels and other snack foods. I was the only customer at the stand and the owners looked very unhappy. They told me that they were very worried because they weren't getting the foot traffic that they needed to survive.

     I offered to pray over the snack stand and they gratefully accepted my offer. Afterwards, I was thrilled that people were coming up to the stand and ordering food. After having seven new customers, they came out and loaded me up with food as a thank you. I left marveling at the incredible grace and goodness of God!


OUR NEED, YOUR BENEFIT!


 

   We need to raise $500,000 for startup costs in order to hire staff and faculty, cover facilities costs, and other initial costs that come with starting our school.

     By becoming a partner, we want to transform and empower your life, too! You will receive gifts that will help you to create the life of your dreams and support you in your intimacy and walk with God.
story_txt:
EQUIPPING AND TRAINING HEALERS WHO EXPERIENCE GOD'S HEALING MIRACLES AND LOVE      Hi, I’m Dr. Susan Richards, a medical doctor and an ordained minister. I received my M.D. from Northwestern University and served on the clinical faculty of Stanford University School of Medicine.       I've been doing medical ministry in the hospitals of the San Francisco area for more than five years and have seen God touch thousands of hopeless patients and miraculously heal them.      I see the crippled walk, the blind see and the deaf hear, all through God's love. Like millions of other people in our country, their doctors had given up on them and offered little hope.      Recently, God spoke to me and said that He wanted me to create the first medically based school of healing in the U.S. that would train many thousands of dedicated students to experience the same type of healing miracles.      Today we are close to launching this vision. The Medical School of Healing is ready to open it's doors!  We are ready to make a difference in your life as well as  your friends and loved ones!     We have a world-class faculty of Christian medical doctors, ministers, creative artists and other gifted healers from many different fields who God has put together!
     We have created the Medical School of Healing to train our students both medically and spiritually to minister to the sick and wounded and experience God’s gift of miracle healing!     Our goal is for our students to walk in the power and love of God and see God’s healing miracles on a consistent basis.OUR VISION     Our world is in need of God’s transforming love. Millions of people suffer from illness and injury. People also need healing in relationships, finances and in their physical, emotional and spiritual lives.       God’s plan is to have everyone be healthy and strong and have the life of their dreams- full of joy, love and abundance. Our program will empower our students to heal the sick and wounded and to transform lives through God! WHERE WE ARE NOWThe Medical of School of Healing is God’s project and His creation. God has been greatly blessing our project  In a short period of time we now have:
Over 1 Million followers on Facebook and growing exponentially
1,500,000 requests annually for healing prayer and an incredible, dedicated prayer team

World changing university that is ready to launch

                              

Innovative and exciting program with conferences and healing clinic starting right away as we move towards our school's launch!
Incredible teaching faculty of Christian medical doctors, prayer healers, inner healing counselors, top biblical scholars and exceptional healers 
Plan for nationwide Healing and Community Centers  
Ready to launch and transform and uplift the lives of millions of people and their communitiesTHE IMPACT     Be part of our future! Support the Medical School of Healing as we train students that transform their local and global communities with the love and healing power of God.     Your contribution funds will help us secure the facilities, equipment, staff and faculty to launch and continue through the first phase of our program.     Jesus wants us to create heaven on earth and to go out and heal the sick and love one another as He loves us. Our program will provide an incredible springboard to launch students into the supernatural miracle life that God created them to enjoy. OUR PROGRAMHere are the seven components of our incredible program!
Medical Training for Healers  - provides healers with the medical knowledge of God's design of the human body for the purpose of ministering  from a medical perspective
Healing and Praying for the Sick and Wounded -  provides a broad range of supernaturally inspired teaching that empowers them for healing 
Healing the Healers -  develops spiritually, mentally, and physically healthy students 

Collaborative Prayer Program - brings all of our students together to pray and worship as one body in Christ 



Practical Field Ministry - integrates what our students are learning in the classroom with hands-on experiential ministry. 
Expert Healing Program - expert healers from a wide variety of backgrounds will share their lives, testimonies, tips and guidance with our students
Community Enrichment Program - brings students together on a more personal basis and builds community among the MSH family.

                     OUR FOUNDER
                                           
                 I love being both a medical doctor and minister! It’s a wonderful gift from God to be able to heal and serve others and see people restored to health, body, mind and soul.         In the five years since God first led me to begin ministering to the sick and injured in the hospitals in of the San Francisco area, I have seen many healing miracles of God with the sickest patients. I have also seen incredible transformation of people's lives.TESTIMONIESHere are a few of the incredible cases of God’s supernatural miracle healings that I have seen in my healing ministry.Quadriplegic walks! Normally, he would have to spend his life in a wheelchair.With prayer, God healed him very rapidly. He was discharged from the hospital already walking again. He is now bowling and starting to run which is normally impossible for quadriplegics to do.Critical Brain Injury Recovers. I prayed for a five year old girl who was in the pediatric ICU. She was in a coma for three weeks and had fractures of  her arm and jaw.     As I prayed for her, God healed and blessed her. She began to talk and interact again and was up walking very quickly. I ministered to a man who was in constant pain and could hardly walk due to severe injury to his knees. The cartilage was so worn down that he had bone grinding on bone. Knee surgery had failed and he couldn't work at construction, his regular job. After healing prayer, the pain was totally gone and he can now walk easily and even work again.Severe deafness healed. I prayed for him and he lost almost 250 pounds in less than 1 month.This is medically impossible and was a total miracle of God.

Used but new to us and very low miles"God opens doors for multiple jobs. God blessed a woman who I recently prayed for: “Opportunities are knocking after a year of unemployment!... I am the most anointed administrator, manager and executive in Jesus Name, amen!"God brings financial prosperity to a snack stand. story:
Short Summary

Rachel R. Raymond is an experienced  Juvenile dependency attorney based in South Pasadena, California. Rachel provides aggressive representation to parents and guardians in DCFS/CPS cases.  We understand the overwhelming nature of these types of cases all too well and was a previous court appointed attorney for parents in Monterey Park Children's court.  We saw just how complex, emotionally draining, and, at times, seemingly hopeless navigating this system can be. Our firm will make sure you are well informed at every step of the process and welcome questions and concerns at almost any time. 

If your children have been taken from you by one of the many social service agencies you may be unsure of where to turn to for help or even feel that your situation is hopeless. Juvenile dependency law is more unique than possibly any other area of law.  The process involves many invested parties. It is complex and intimidating.  In few other areas of law will anyone find themselves arrayed against a half a dozen or more persons attempting to take their children, who are often willing to engage in less than admirable conduct to achieve that end. Your best chance of having your children returned to your care is with an attorney experienced in dependency law.

I want to focus 100% of my time advocating for children and parents. I also want to give back to the community. Launching a non profit law firm will allow me to do what I need to do and give back all that I can.

You can help me achieve that by helping me gather the intial $1500 that I need to file the 503(c) paperwork. Then I can move forward with the help of dedicated friends to seek out grants and donations to help me continue to protect the children.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are  seeking $1500 for the filing fee for the nonprofit paperwork. We are  also seeking $600 to help pay the first months rent of office space after launching the law firm. 
  • If we don't reach the entire goal the funds will be directed towards the cost of  the intial filing fees.

The Impact

  • My main focus is advocacy and protecting the children. This is a very unique area of law that is so complex and overwhelming resulting in  the children suffering. I intend to help change this for the better!
  • I have succeeded in returning children to the parents and because I have an in-depth understanding of the Juvenile court  system I have successfully negotiated and prevailed in countless cases aginst DCFS and protected the parents and children's civil rights.
  • I also advocate for any person whose civil rights have been trampled on but could not afford strong and aggressive representation.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • No matter what the donation is, if you can't help out you can still support us by getting the word out!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Child Scholars is raising $11,400 U.S. dollars to send 40 brilliant children to elementary school in Nigeria. 

Public Schools are NOT FREE in Nigeria! 

CS's goal is to help BREAK the POVERTY CYCLE, and give kids meaningful choices and opportunities for success in this world.

Two (2) years ago, on July 14, 2013, Child Scholars began in Cleveland, TN, USA.  According to our Founder, Emmanuel Okenye, 

"CS started because I have lived in poverty in Africa and always seen so many young children on the streets engaging in micro-economic enterprises during school hours! Many of these brilliant 5year olds  who passed their entrance exams can't start school because their parents lack the financial resources to pay.  In Nigeria, school starts at age 3-5.  But Public schools are still not Free in Nigeria.

Decent Schools worth attending costs approximately $500 U.S. dollars per child each year.  These children are smart, driven and able; but because destitute families cannot afford the school fees or school related costs, they cannot regularly attend school, if at all.  I was alarmed  and disturbed that children so young were being deprived of education and opportunity for success.  I decided to take action and create Child Scholars, to enable poor children to have meaningful access to education. We originally started by renting a building to teach kids to read and write ourselves but transitioned to sponsoring kids in other schools while we fundraise to build a school for them."

CS Scholarships pay high school fees, text books, supplies, transportation and lunch.  Our Scholarships are renewed each year if we have funding; and the students maintained at least a "B" Grade Point Average, Regular School Attendance and Good Moral Character.

CS currently has 40 children in elementary schools and that's where you come in. WE NEED YOUR HELP to KEEP OUR BRILLIANT CHILDREN IN SCHOOL!

Any contribution you can provide is greatly appreciated and makes a big difference in the lives of our children.  Our overall funding goal both online and offline is $11,400.00.  Thank you.


While plans to build an e-learning schoolhouse for 500 are underway we would like to continue sponsoring our current child scholars in another established school in neighboring community in Ikorodu Nigeria. In other words, we do not want our building plans to disrupt the education of these kids, we want them to continue their learning at a different learning center.

What we need & what you get

HELP US KEEP THEIR DREAMS ALIVE! They will need approximately $95 tuition a term and there are 3 terms in one school year. This $95 fee will not include tuition and school supplies like books, snacks, and school uniforms. And the School year begins SEPT 14. Non of the kids are in school yet but we want to get them all back by Jan 2 2016 Unfailingly.

We need your help to keep our 40 children on our Scholarship in elementary school!  You will get the satisfaction of helping to provide opportunities to a brilliant child in need, and at the same time, helping to transform Africa and the world!

  • It costs approximately $285 U.S. Dollars to educate one child each year in elementary school.  The minimum wage in Nigeria is approximately $45 U.S. Dollars per week.  Most of the parents earn less than minimum wage.
  • 100% of your donation funds academic scholarships.
  • 20% of contributions from sponsor organizations and special fund raising events fund operating costs. 
  • You are helping to change a community, a country and the world and also get some great perks!  
  • We have 3 Awesome, fabulously designed T-shirts for various contribution levels!  We also have tickets to our 2015 event in Tennessee and will waive visa costs for 2 contributors to travel to Nigeria with us in July 2016!

Our Success:

Since 2013, CS has awarded 50 Student Scholarships in excess of #9 Million Nigerian Naira to brilliant students in financial need, who as a result, are now attending high schools throughout Nigeria.  In 2015, Our child scholars performed better in reading than most of the kids in their grade level in 5 schools around the local district of Imota, Maya, Odogunyo

A majority of Child Scholars are "A" Students and  on the Honor Roll; and a few have a "B" Grade Point Average.  They all regularly attend school and are eager to transform their lives for the better.


WE ARE A 501c3 verified non-profit organisation



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't sponsor a child, no worries, you can also share this campaign with your friends and family. Maybe they just might help!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Als Bewusstseins-Coach helfe ich bereits vielen Menschen dabei, wieder in ihre eigene Kraft zu kommen, damit sie ein gesünderes, erfüllteres, glücklicheres Leben führen können - und zwar auf allen Ebenen! 

As a Consciousness-Coach I already help many people to claim back their own power in their lives to live a more healthy, abundant, happy life on all levels!  


Als Grundlage dafür dient meine bisherige Ausbildung sowie jahrzehntelange eigene Lebenserfahrung. An meine Klienten stelle ich den gleichen hohen Anspruch, wie an mich selbst: die Dinge im Leben umzusetzen und zu leben und nicht nur weiteres Wissen anzuhäufen und es als Konzept und Vorstellung im Kopf zu behalten. Viele Menschen - die meisten - haben ein unglaubliches Wissen, aber nur die allerwenigstens können es auch wirklich umsetzen. Und genau das ist mein Anstreben! Ich helfe den Menschen bei der Umsetzung.

My coaching is based on my previous trainings and qualifications with lots of well known people who helped me getting into and claiming back my own power. So I can look back on years and years of lived and integrated life experiences. I've done and tried it all on myself first until I coach others on how to achieve their goals. For me that is the only way to authenticity. And that is my interest: that people come into their own realization and not keeping all this knowledge just in their heads as a concept or as a believe. So many people - most of them - have a lot of knowledge but only a very few are able to really implement all this in their everyday lives. That's where my coaching begins!    


Es muss im Alltag anwendbar sein, in jeder Situation, und zwar auf natürlichste Weise aus dem tiefsten innersten Selbst, und nicht antrainiert oder angelernt, denn das ist nicht von Dauer und geht sehr schnell schief, da es nur ein weiteres künstliches Konzept war, das nie verinnerlicht und begriffen wurde.

It must be applicable in the everyday life, in any situation, to emerge from the true inner balanced self in the most natural way; not in an acquired or trained way which would only cover things up that are not truly internalized and realized. And rather sooner than later this will go wrong because it was just another artificial concept and not truly integrated.


Mein Ziel ist es, dass jeder Mensch in der Lage ist, in seinem Leben unbegründetes Wohlbefinden zu erfahren - frei von Ängsten, von Blockaden, von alten und/oder übernommenen Vorstellungen und ungehindert seinen angestrebten Zielen entgegengehen kann, ob beruflich oder privat; ein Wohlbefinden, das aus dem tiefsten Inneren eines jeden Einzelnen kommt und nicht mehr von äußeren Dingen und Menschen abhängig ist, weil genau das in hohem Maße automatisch zu mehr Fülle, einer stabilen Gesundheit, mehr Erfolg, mehr Glück im Außen und damit im Leben führt. Was wäre, wenn du deine größten Blockaden, wie Ängste, Zweifel usw., die dich in niedrigen Frequenzbereichen halten, sofort auflösen könntest, um automatisch in höhere Frequenzbereiche zu kommen, sodass du frei deinen Zielen entgegen gehen kannst? 

It is my goal that everyone is able to live and experience uncaused wellbeing in their lives - free from fears, free from blocks, free from old believes that are mostly taken over from other people or family members but which are ultimately not yours at all - so that you can go unhindered towards your goals - no matter if it is a private or a business goal. It is a wellbeing that emerges from deep within of each and everyone and is not influenced by outer circumstances. This will automatically lead to more abundance, more stability, more health, more wellbeing in the life of each and everyone. What if you could eliminate and resolve your biggest fears and blocks and doubts in an instant to automatically access higher frequencies that automatically lead to a more fulfilled and abundant life on all kind of levels?  


Mit der Ausbildung "Instant Miracle Mastery" kann ich dies für alle Menschen, die zu mir kommen, bereitstellen, sodass jeder ungehindert und somit schneller zu seinem Ziel gelangen kann! Auch wenn dies vorher für denjenigen unmöglich schien.

That's why I really want to be part of the training "Instant Miracle Mastery." It comes from a deep inner knowingness and passion that things can be far more easy for all of us to start to thrive in our lives! So many things in our lives don't serve us anymore but we get stuck in them and it is my intention that we don't spend a whole life and all the money on going to different therapists and going through years and years of therapy. There has to be an Easy Button - and I know and experienced there is!


Ihr als Unterstützer helft mir dabei, dies für viele, viele Menschen möglich zu machen und somit tragt ihr in hohem Maße dazu bei, dass immer mehr und mehr Menschen eine vollkommen neue Lebensqualität (und dadurch Motivation in Berufs- und Privatleben) durch mehr Fülle und mehr Wohlbefinden in ihrem Leben erfahren, frei von Blockaden, die oft die ganze Fülle und Lebensfreude verhindern, und damit kann sich wiederum auch das Gesamtbewusstsein der Menschen auf diesem Planeten schrittweise ändern kann. Denn jeder Mensch ist in der Lage, wieder in seine ganze Freude und Kraft zu kommen und zu seinem eigenen wahren Potenzialen zu erwachen.  

Mehr über mich und meine Arbeit findest du auf meiner Webseite www.neuesbewusstseinleben.de  

As a supporter you help me in so many ways that I can be of service for many, many people and for you if you so choose! More and more people will gain a much higher quality of life that is based on a deep inner, natural wellbeing and they will be motivated in so many new ways to enjoy their life anew, free from blocks and fears that have held them back artificially. And this in itself contributes to the mass consciousness that can also change in many more ways to more joy, more ease, more abundance, more uncaused wellbeing. It is a positive spiral and it will affect each and everyone. Everybody is able to awaken to their full potential in their lives.

(You will find more of me and my work on my website which is only in german at the moment.)


Was du mir gibst & was du bekommst

  • Meine Investition für diese Ausbildung beträgt € 7995 EUR (inklusive Nebenkosten für Flug, Hotel, Mietauto, Verpflegung), die in den USA bei dem Weltklasse-Coach Nr.1 Christian Mickelsen erfolgt.
  • Dich als Unterstützer erwarten einzigartige Perks, denn du sollst ebenfalls von meiner Ausbildung und Deiner Unterstützung in hohem Maße profitieren!
Your investment helps me paying for the training and all the accommodations and travel expenses during that time. The training is held by #1 world-class coach Christian Mickelsen. To support me you can choose to use some of the interesting perks I offer which might be useful for you or you can just donate whatever feels right for you. I am already so grateful for whatever will be created by you!

Die Folgen

Was Du mit Deinem Beitrag bewirkst:

  • Es ist einfach an der Zeit, dass die Menschen hin zu einem Neuen Bewusstsein erwachen und sie genau die Lebensfreude erfahren, für die sie hier auf dieser Erde sind. Jeder hat ein Recht auf Freude, Fülle, Wohlbefinden, Glück!
  • Für mein bisheriges Wirken wurde mir im Jahr 2012 der "Inspire Consciousness"-Award verliehen und ich möchte mit diesem Projekt weiterhin das Bewusstsein der Menschen in hohem Maße inspirieren.
  • Durch meine eigenen Erfahrungen und Erlebnisse weiss ich, dass wirklich jeder dies alles in seinem Leben auf leichte, einfache und elegante Weise umsetzen kann - ohne daran arbeiten oder jahrelang in Therapie gehen zu müssen! Ich möchte euch an meiner Meisterschaft teilhaben lassen, damit auch ihr Meister in eurem Leben sein könnt! 
  • Jegliche langwierigen Therapien, um Blockaden zu lösen, Ängste, Zweifel, Depressionen freizugeben, sich in die Freude "zu denken" (was sowieso nicht funktioniert) sind auf einmal vollkommen veraltet. Wir wollen jetzt ein Resultat, es sofort fühlen, und das wird möglich.
The consequences will be that people ultimately awaken to a new consciousness in their lives! To experience more joy, more health, more abundance which is their natural birthright and what they have forgotten.
In 2012 I was honored with the "Inspire Consciousness Award" and I am really passionate about inspiring the consciousness of each and every person I meet. But just by being me and showing that it is possible no matter what others might think or say. Because of my own experiences in life I know that things can be done in an easy, graceful and simple way with no struggle, nothing to work on. I would like you to participate in my mastery so that you can live your own mastery from your inner core level. We all want to have immediate results and this is possible.


Risiken & Herausforderungen

  • Welches Risiko und welche Herausforderung könnte es hierbei geben? 
  • Das einzige Risiko ist, dass zu wenig Gelder zur Durchführung meines Ziels einfließen werden und dadurch die Ausbildung jetzt noch nicht stattfinden könnte.
  • Die Herausforderung wird dann für mich sein, die Ausbildung entweder dennoch zu absolvieren, da es wirklich mein tiefstes Bestreben ist, alles so leicht wie möglich für jeden sein zu lassen, denn es geht um die Leichtigkeit im Leben - darauf liegt mein Fokus. 
  • Ein weiteres Risiko ist immer der Mensch selbst, denn Du musst für Veränderung offen sein, sie wirklich wollen und dich dir selbst gegenüber verpflichten, die volle Verantwortung für dein Leben zu übernehmen. Jeder befindet sich auf seinem Weg und ich missioniere niemanden, denn jeder darf genau so sein, wie er sein möchte, mit allen Erfahrungen, mit allen Höhen und Tiefen, die jeder einzelne für sich durchlaufen möchte. UND gleichzeitig kann  alles auch viel leichter, anmutiger und müheloser sein!  
  • D.h. wenn Du Dir eines der Perks zur Unterstützung meiner Kampagne aussuchst, entscheidest du dich dafür, dass du dir gegenüber die Verpflichtung eingehst, dein Leben wirklich verändern zu wollen. Und dein Leben wird sich verändern!
The risk is that I don't achieve the amount of money that would help me to go to the training. So the challenge for me is then to be part of the training no matter what! Because something is telling me on a very deep level it is time to bring this to many more people now. But as always another risk is the human itself. It takes your full commitment to change your life and to take responsibility for your life and for your creations. I don't evangelize people as everybody is on their perfect path and has to experience everything they choose to experience, no matter how this might look like. This is the beauty of all of our lives! AND it all can be done more gracefully, more effortlessly. You choose how you want to experience life - there is always a choice. So if you choose to take advantage of one of my perks you make the commitment to yourself to truly change your life. And then your life will be changed! 


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Wenn Du aus irgendwelchen Gründen meine Kampagne finanziell nicht unterstützen kannst:

  • Bitte bedenke: Jeder noch so kleine Betrag hilft mir enorm!
  • Bitte verbreite diese Kampagne! Es gibt viele Menschen, die ihr Leben wirklich verändern möchten und endlich Durchbrüche erfahren möchten, ohne langwierige, geldaufwändige Therapien! 
  • Nutze für die Verbreitung das Tool von Indiegogo ! 
If you cannot support me financially for whatever reason I would be so happy if you could spread the word about my campaign! Use the tool on Indiegogo, write emails to friends or use your social networks! We all can change lives to the very best on this beautiful planet earth because it is our birthright to claim back our own power, health, abundance, uncaused wellbeing. Thank You!
story_txt:
Kurzbeschreibung Als Bewusstseins-Coach helfe ich bereits vielen Menschen dabei, wieder in ihre eigene Kraft zu kommen, damit sie ein gesünderes, erfüllteres, glücklicheres Leben führen können - und zwar auf allen Ebenen! 
As a Consciousness-Coach I already help many people to claim back their own power in their lives to live a more healthy, abundant, happy life on all levels!  

Als Grundlage dafür dient meine bisherige Ausbildung sowie jahrzehntelange eigene Lebenserfahrung. An meine Klienten stelle ich den gleichen hohen Anspruch, wie an mich selbst: die Dinge im Leben umzusetzen und zu leben und nicht nur weiteres Wissen anzuhäufen und es als Konzept und Vorstellung im Kopf zu behalten. Viele Menschen - die meisten - haben ein unglaubliches Wissen, aber nur die allerwenigstens können es auch wirklich umsetzen. Und genau das ist mein Anstreben! Ich helfe den Menschen bei der Umsetzung.
My coaching is based on my previous trainings and qualifications with lots of well known people who helped me getting into and claiming back my own power. So I can look back on years and years of lived and integrated life experiences. I've done and tried it all on myself first until I coach others on how to achieve their goals. For me that is the only way to authenticity. And that is my interest: that people come into their own realization and not keeping all this knowledge just in their heads as a concept or as a believe. So many people - most of them - have a lot of knowledge but only a very few are able to really implement all this in their everyday lives. That's where my coaching begins!    

Es muss im Alltag anwendbar sein, in jeder Situation, und zwar auf natürlichste Weise aus dem tiefsten innersten Selbst, und nicht antrainiert oder angelernt, denn das ist nicht von Dauer und geht sehr schnell schief, da es nur ein weiteres künstliches Konzept war, das nie verinnerlicht und begriffen wurde.
It must be applicable in the everyday life, in any situation, to emerge from the true inner balanced self in the most natural way; not in an acquired or trained way which would only cover things up that are not truly internalized and realized. And rather sooner than later this will go wrong because it was just another artificial concept and not truly integrated.

Mein Ziel ist es, dass jeder Mensch in der Lage ist, in seinem Leben unbegründetes Wohlbefinden zu erfahren - frei von Ängsten, von Blockaden, von alten und/oder übernommenen Vorstellungen und ungehindert seinen angestrebten Zielen entgegengehen kann, ob beruflich oder privat; ein Wohlbefinden, das aus dem tiefsten Inneren eines jeden Einzelnen kommt und nicht mehr von äußeren Dingen und Menschen abhängig ist, weil genau das in hohem Maße automatisch zu mehr Fülle, einer stabilen Gesundheit, mehr Erfolg, mehr Glück im Außen und damit im Leben führt. Was wäre, wenn du deine größten Blockaden, wie Ängste, Zweifel usw., die dich in niedrigen Frequenzbereichen halten, sofort auflösen könntest, um automatisch in höhere Frequenzbereiche zu kommen, sodass du frei deinen Zielen entgegen gehen kannst? 
It is my goal that everyone is able to live and experience uncaused wellbeing in their lives - free from fears, free from blocks, free from old believes that are mostly taken over from other people or family members but which are ultimately not yours at all - so that you can go unhindered towards your goals - no matter if it is a private or a business goal. It is a wellbeing that emerges from deep within of each and everyone and is not influenced by outer circumstances. This will automatically lead to more abundance, more stability, more health, more wellbeing in the life of each and everyone. What if you could eliminate and resolve your biggest fears and blocks and doubts in an instant to automatically access higher frequencies that automatically lead to a more fulfilled and abundant life on all kind of levels?  

Mit der Ausbildung "Instant Miracle Mastery" kann ich dies für alle Menschen, die zu mir kommen, bereitstellen, sodass jeder ungehindert und somit schneller zu seinem Ziel gelangen kann! Auch wenn dies vorher für denjenigen unmöglich schien.
That's why I really want to be part of the training "Instant Miracle Mastery." It comes from a deep inner knowingness and passion that things can be far more easy for all of us to start to thrive in our lives! So many things in our lives don't serve us anymore but we get stuck in them and it is my intention that we don't spend a whole life and all the money on going to different therapists and going through years and years of therapy. There has to be an Easy Button - and I know and experienced there is!

Ihr als Unterstützer helft mir dabei, dies für viele, viele Menschen möglich zu machen und somit tragt ihr in hohem Maße dazu bei, dass immer mehr und mehr Menschen eine vollkommen neue Lebensqualität (und dadurch Motivation in Berufs- und Privatleben) durch mehr Fülle und mehr Wohlbefinden in ihrem Leben erfahren, frei von Blockaden, die oft die ganze Fülle und Lebensfreude verhindern, und damit kann sich wiederum auch das Gesamtbewusstsein der Menschen auf diesem Planeten schrittweise ändern kann. Denn jeder Mensch ist in der Lage, wieder in seine ganze Freude und Kraft zu kommen und zu seinem eigenen wahren Potenzialen zu erwachen.  
Mehr über mich und meine Arbeit findest du auf meiner Webseite www.neuesbewusstseinleben.de  
As a supporter you help me in so many ways that I can be of service for many, many people and for you if you so choose! More and more people will gain a much higher quality of life that is based on a deep inner, natural wellbeing and they will be motivated in so many new ways to enjoy their life anew, free from blocks and fears that have held them back artificially. And this in itself contributes to the mass consciousness that can also change in many more ways to more joy, more ease, more abundance, more uncaused wellbeing. It is a positive spiral and it will affect each and everyone. Everybody is able to awaken to their full potential in their lives.
